body_html:
• As a suggestion I would say that clearly, windows approach is highly experimental hence if you can dual boot Ubuntu than would be so easy to get the best out of Tensor flow even with Two GPU.

  • Alienware laptops come up with an external graphic amplifier port where you can put 1,2,4.. external graphic cards which currently I am using.
body_text:
As a suggestion I would say that clearly, windows approach is highly experimental hence if you can dual boot Ubuntu than would be so easy to get the best out of Tensor flow even with Two GPU.


Alienware laptops come up with an external graphic amplifier port where you can put 1,2,4.. external graphic cards which currently I am using.
body:
- As a suggestion I would say that clearly, windows approach is highly experimental hence if you can dual boot Ubuntu than would be so easy to get the best out of Tensor flow even with Two GPU.

- Alienware laptops come up with an external graphic amplifier port where you can put 1,2,4.. external graphic cards which currently I am using.
